feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: The restaurant was beautifully decorated and impeccably clean. The attention to detail, from the sparkling silverware to the fresh flowers on the tables, created a truly inviting atmosphere.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: We were very impressed by the cleanliness of the restaurant. The tables were spotless, the floors gleamed, and the restrooms were well-stocked and fresh-smelling. It's clear that the staff takes pride in maintaining a hygienic environment.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: The open kitchen allowed us to see firsthand the cleanliness and organization of the food preparation area. Everything looked spotless, and the chefs were all wearing proper attire and gloves. This transparency gave us peace of mind about the hygiene practices.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: The overall impression of the restaurant was one of professionalism and cleanliness. From the well-maintained furniture to the attentive staff, everything felt polished and hygienic, creating a comfortable and enjoyable dining experience.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: The high chairs for our children were clean and sanitized, which we really appreciated. It's these small details that show the restaurant cares about the overall cleanliness and ensures a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: While the dining area itself seemed reasonably clean, the restrooms were a different story. They were cluttered, lacked proper ventilation, and were missing essential supplies like soap and paper towels. This definitely needs improvement.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: We noticed a few dirty dishes left on a table near us for an extended period, which gave us some pause about the overall cleanliness of the restaurant. A more prompt bussing service would be beneficial.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: The outdoor patio seating had a lovely view, but the tables and chairs were a bit dusty and weathered. Some power washing and a fresh coat of paint would go a long way in creating a more inviting outdoor space.

feedback.subject: Cleanliness
feedback.message: The restaurant was impeccably clean. The floors, tables, and even the restrooms were spotless. It made for a very pleasant dining experience.

feedback.message: The mocktails were refreshing and well-balanced. It was nice to have non-alcoholic options that were just as enjoyable.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were overpriced for what we received. They lacked flavor and creativity, making them a disappointment.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: I was impressed with the range of mocktails available. It showed thoughtfulness in catering to non-drinkers.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The glassware for the wines was clean and elegant. It added to the dining experience and made the wines more enjoyable.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were beautifully presented, but they were too strong for my liking. It overshadowed the meal.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The beer selection was disappointing. There were only a few options, and none of them were particularly exciting.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were well-crafted and flavorful. They were a highlight of the evening and paired wonderfully with our appetizers.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The wines by the glass were excellent. Each one complemented the dishes we ordered, enhancing the dining experience.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The mixed drinks were poorly made. They lacked balance and were not worth the price we paid.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The wine list was extensive, with a good range of varietals and regions. It made choosing a bottle enjoyable.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were served in unique glassware that added to the presentation. It made the experience feel more special.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: I was disappointed that my wine glass was not filled to the top. It felt like we were short-changed on the pour.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The pairing wines were carefully chosen and enhanced the flavors of each course. It was a thoughtful addition to the meal.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The range of non-alcoholic drinks was impressive. It showed that the restaurant cares about catering to all preferences.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were a bit weak. They lacked the punch and flavor I expected, which was disappointing.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: I enjoyed the selection of craft beers available. It was nice to see some local favorites on the menu.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were creative and delicious! The bartenders were true mixologists, crafting drinks that were both visually appealing and bursting with flavor.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: We were disappointed with the limited selection of non-alcoholic drinks. Having more creative mocktails or interesting sparkling water options would be a great improvement.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The wine list was extensive and offered something for everyone, from budget-friendly options to high-end vintages. The staff was knowledgeable and helped us choose the perfect wine pairing for our meal.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The glasses our drinks came in were chipped and looked a bit worn. Upgrading the glassware would elevate the overall drinking experience.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: Our cocktails arrived barely half full of ice, leaving very little actual drink. We would have appreciated a more generous pour for the price.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The recommended wine pairing with our meal was spot on! It complemented the flavors of the food perfectly and truly enhanced the dining experience.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The draft beer selection was a bit limited, with only the usual mainstream options. Offering some local craft beers would be a welcome addition.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The fresh-squeezed juices were a refreshing and healthy option. We appreciated having these available alongside the usual sugary sodas.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The iced tea tasted a bit like instant powder, not freshly brewed. Using loose leaf tea would make a big difference in flavor.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were beautifully presented, with unique garnishes and colorful syrups. They were a feast for the eyes as well as the taste buds.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The service staff was very knowledgeable about the drink menu and could answer all our questions about ingredients and pairings.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The happy hour drink specials were a great deal! We enjoyed trying a variety of cocktails at a discounted price.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The tap water had a strong chlorine taste. Offering filtered or bottled water would be a better option.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The milkshake was delicious, but the whipped cream topping was a bit artificial-tasting. Using real whipped cream would be a nice touch.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: We were surprised that the restaurant didn't offer any non-dairy milk alternatives for coffee or tea. This would be a good option for vegans or those with lactose intolerance.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The selection of bottled beers was impressive, with a wide variety of styles and international options to choose from.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktails were a bit too sweet for our taste. Perhaps offering a selection of classic cocktails alongside the more creative options would be beneficial.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: We were impressed by the wide variety of house-made sodas on the menu. The unique flavors were a refreshing change from the usual cola or sprite.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The coffee was strong and freshly brewed, a perfect way to end the meal. They also offered a variety of flavored syrups and creamers for customization.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The price of the bottled water was a bit high. Offering free refills or filtered tap water would be a more reasonable option.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktail menu was extensive, offering a wide range of innovative and classic choices. We started with a refreshing gin-based cocktail that was perfectly balanced with botanical flavors and a hint of citrus. For dinner, we switched to a robust red wine recommended by the sommelier, which paired beautifully with our steak. The glassware was impeccable, enhancing the presentation and enjoyment of each drink. Overall, the drinks were a highlight of our dining experience, adding sophistication and flavor to our evening.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: I was impressed by the variety of drinks available, from signature cocktails to a well-curated wine list. The margarita I ordered was disappointing, though; it arrived in a glass that wasn't filled to the top, making it feel like I didn't get my money's worth. On the other hand, my partner's whiskey sour was crafted with care, balancing the sweetness and acidity perfectly. The wine selection offered great options by the glass, and we enjoyed a crisp Sauvignon Blanc with our seafood starters. Despite the minor hiccup with the margarita, the overall experience with drinks was enjoyable and added to our evening.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The bar at the restaurant was well-stocked with a diverse range of spirits and liqueurs, which made choosing a cocktail a fun experience. We opted for their signature martinis, served in chilled, elegant glassware that added to the sophisticated ambiance. The drinks were expertly mixed, with just the right balance of flavors. However, the wine selection was somewhat limited, and the glasses were not poured generously. Despite this, the cocktails stole the show with their creativity and presentation, making our evening memorable.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The mocktail menu at the restaurant was surprisingly extensive, offering inventive and refreshing non-alcoholic options. As someone who doesn't drink alcohol, I appreciated the effort put into these drinks. I started with a berry-infused mocktail that was bursting with flavor and beautifully garnished. The glassware was clean and elegant, adding to the overall experience. However, my partner's cocktail, a classic Old Fashioned, lacked the depth of flavor expected. The wines by the glass were decent, but we wished for a broader selection to accompany our meal. Despite the hit-or-miss with some drinks, the mocktails stood out as a highlight of our visit.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The restaurant's drink menu was quite extensive, catering to various tastes with a selection of craft beers, wines, and cocktails. We started with a local IPA, which was full of hoppy flavor and served in a chilled pint glass. For dinner, we opted for a Malbec recommended by our server, which paired excellently with our hearty mains. The glassware for the wine was clean and elegant, enhancing the overall experience. However, the cocktails we tried were a bit underwhelming; they lacked the complexity and depth we expected. Despite this, the range of drinks and the quality of the wine selection made our dining experience enjoyable and memorable.

feedback.subject: Drinks
feedback.message: The cocktail menu offered a mix of classics and innovative creations that piqued our interest. We started with a refreshing mojito served in a tall glass, perfectly muddled with fresh mint and lime. The presentation was spot-on, enhancing the experience. Moving on to wines, we were pleased with the sommelier's recommendation of a crisp Chardonnay that paired beautifully with our seafood entrees. The glassware was clean and polished, adding a touch of elegance to each drink. However, we found the beer selection lacking in variety, with only a few options available. Despite this minor drawback, the overall quality and presentation of the drinks added to our enjoyment of the evening.
